news.title: Feds ask Waymo about robotaxis repeatedly passing school buses in Austin

news.title: Micro1, a Scale AI competitor, touts crossing $100M ARR
news.summary: Micro1 started the year with roughly $7 million ARR. Now, it claims to have surpassed $100 million in ARR, double what it reported in September.

news.title: EU fines X $140 million over ‘deceptive’ blue checkmarks
news.summary: The European Union has served Elon Musk’s X with a €120 million (about $140 million) penalty for violating the bloc’s digital service rulebook, in part for the “deceptive design” of its blue checkmark. news.title: Facebook and Instagram have a new hub to help get hijacked accounts back

news.title: Microsoft finally has a better looking Run dialog for Windows 11
